content.p: Visit us for an open day, a campus tour, or arrange an online meeting. We are currently unable to arrange in person meetings on campus with members of staff but you can still connect and visit us in other ways. Complete the form below to arrange an online meeting with a member of our International Student Recruitment team. They can talk to you about our courses, entry requirements, scholarships, campus facilities, support services and the student experience at Nottingham. Have you got questions about a course, student life, or the city of Nottingham? Visit our page on The Student Room and speak to one of our current University of Nottingham students. Chat to our students Our open days are a great way to learn more about our undergraduate courses, meet academics, chat to students and explore our campuses. They're taking place in September and October. Book your place Book your campus tour here The information that you provide in this form will be held in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation. Your personal data will be collected and processed for the purpose of arranging a visit to the University of Nottingham and any correspondence related to your visit. If you wish to receive information about courses, events, scholarships and services at the University of Nottingham in the future, you can also complete our general enquiry form. You can access a full Privacy Statement here.
